GSP28jsbh1-4u:1300: ādipadena saṃgraha iti somanāthakṛtaṃ vyākhyānaṃ --- apāstam;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1302: udbhidadhikaraṇetvaprakṛtalaukikakarmaṇi guṇavidhitvasyopakṣiptasya pratibandhottaraṃ dātumaprakṛtavaidikaviśvajidupanyāsaḥ kṛta iti spaṣṭameva śāstradīpikāyāṃ pratīyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1303: ata eva tadagre jyotiṣṭomasyaivāśrayatvābhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣopasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1304: ata eva prakāśakāraiḥ “śyenasya sāmavaidikatvāttatra ca śākhābhedenānyasyāpi prakṛtatvasaṃbhavādādiśabda” ityādigranthena saṃbhavābhiprāyeṇādiśabdaḥ śāstradīpikāgato vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1305: ataḥ prakṛtajyotiṣṭomāśritasya śyenapakṣyādiguṇasya phaloddeśena yuktaṃ vidhānam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1306: kāmyatvāccotpattiśiṣṭasyāpi somasya nityasya bādhanamapi nāyuktamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1311: sādhanaṃ hi pratītamatyantāvinābhāvāt svasādhyāṃ kriyāmakleśenaiva pratipādayati
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1321: etena --- “sādhanaṃ hī” ti vārtikagranthasya jyotiṣṭomoddeśena vidhīyamānasya śyenādestatsādhanatvapratīteḥ svasādhyalakṣakatvamuktami“ti nyāyasudhākṛtāṃ tadvyākhyānaṃ --- apāstam;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1323: ato viśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhāna- pūrvapakṣa eva vārtikatātparyamiti prakāśakārāḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1327: “guṇavidhāne ca śyenadravyaṃ vidhīyata” iti tadeva stotavyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1328: naca “tasyaivātmanaivopamānaṃ yukta“miti siddhāntavārtikagranthāt śyenākhyaguṇamātravidhānasyaiva pūrvapakṣo na tu viśiṣṭavidhānasya;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1331: ata eva matvarthalakṣaṇopanyāsādviśiṣṭavidhipakṣo 'pyastu tatsammata ityabhipretyaiva pūjyapādaissamānakakṣādvayamapi darśitam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1333: (yathā vai śyena iti vākyaśeṣavirodhaḥ prathamapakṣa iti śaṅkā)
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1335: ādyapakṣe “yathā vai śyena” ityarthavāde ayamiti prathamāntena vidheyaśyenasyaiva
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1345: na hyatra vidhyuddeśaḥ sandigdho yena yena vākyaśeṣeṇa nirṇīyeta /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1352: yāvadvilāsā iva lāsyavāsā” iti caraṇatrayamasya jñeyam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1357: dharmabhede 'pyananvayāṅgīkāre “dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu samaṃ prapede yathā tathaivāvarajeṣu vṛtti” mityādāvapi ananvayāpattyā dharmabhedanibandhaniyamocchedāpattiḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1364: ata eva vārtike ananvayālaṅkāro yathā “rāmarāvaṇayoryuddhaṃ” ityādinā śaṅkitaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1366: sutarāṃ siddhānta iva tadupapatterna rūḍhityāgena nāmatvaṃ yuktam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1370: lakṣyamāṇaguṇairyogādvṛtteriṣṭā tu lakṣaṇā” iti tatsiddhisūtragatavārtikoktarītyā guṇalakṣaṇāyā ādhikyāt gurubhūtatvaṃ spaṣṭam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1372: gauṇārthāvagame śrutyarthasyāvivakṣitasya vākyārthe 'nanvayācchrutipīḍeti saiva jyāyasīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1379: tathātve ekasyā eva vyakteḥ kālabhedenopamānatvakalpanetāvadyayā śyenavyaktyā pūrvaṃ nipatya māṃsādanaṃ kṛtaṃ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1380: tayā vairiṇo vyāpādanaṃ kriyate ityarthāpatternipatyādatta iti bhūtakālalakṣaṇā,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1388: 'pi śyenapada eva nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā nāmatvāśrayaṇaṃ yuktamityabhipretya siddhāntamāha ---nāyamiti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1396: ata eva --- “yadyadhyāsena vaktṛṇāṃ gauṇī vṛttiḥ prakalpate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1397: vede sā na kathañcitsyādadhyāropayiturvinā” iti vārtike tatsiddhisūtre samāropitatadbhāvo gauṇīti mataṃ --- nirastam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1402: mama tvanuvādabhūte nāmadheya iti vaiṣamyānna doṣaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1405: evañca prasiddhaśyenātiriktaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ ca yāgarūpamabhicāraphalajanakaṃ śyenapadapratipādyamityetāvadavagate
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1407: nirūḍhyaṅgīkāraprayojanaṃ tu “samānamitarat śyenene“tyādau prasiddhaśyenayāgopasthitireva na tu rūḍhyā śyenapakṣiṇo grahaṇam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1408: naca yāgasya bhrātṛvyādānasādhanatvena śyenasādṛśyopapatteḥ vidheyavetasāvakastutyarthamapāṃ stutiriva yāgastutiḥ;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1413: ca gauravāpattau ca dvitīyavidhiprakārāpādakatvoktyā sūcitāyāṃ yadi kaścidatropasaṃhāraprābalyamāpādayettaṃ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1416: kintu pūrvoktadoṣāpattyā lāghavena śyenanāmakayāgavidhāne niścite śyenaśabdasya yāganāmatvāya
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1421: yathā --- avakābhiragniṃ vikarṣatītyatrāvakāśabdasya “āpo vai śāntā” ityarthavādānusāreṇa nāpsu lakṣaṇābhyupeyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1427: yattu --- atropakramaparākramavāde pakṣiparatva evārthavādāñjasyaṃ yāgaparatve cānāñjasyamupapāditam,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1428: tathāhi --- pakṣadvaye 'pi tāvattatropamānabhāgasya “yathā śyenaḥ pakṣī nipatya matsyādikamādatte ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1431: pakṣiṇi yāgecobhayatrāpi śatrormukhyasya nipatyādānasyāsaṃbhavāt pakṣipakṣe phale yāge vā sādhanatvena viniyuktasya pakṣiṇaḥ śatrorādāne vyāpārāsaṃbhavāt
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1433: evañca vākyaśeṣasya pakṣiparatve yathā śyenapakṣī nipatya matsyādikamādatte evamayaṃ phale yāge vā viniyuktaḥ śyenaḥ pakṣī yajamānasya śatruṃ mārayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1435: na tu śyenasyaiva śyeneneti nātra bhedena sādṛśyānupapattiḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1437: tathāpi yathā jale svacchandaṃ viharato matsyasya śyenakṛtanipatyādānaṃ jhaṭityaśaṅkitopasthitaṃ bhavati,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1440: avaśyaṃ ca tasya sādhāraṇadharmasya gamyamānatvaṃ pakṣāntare 'pyabhyupagantavyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1441: anyathā dviṣanmāraṇamātrasya vidhyuddeśagatatvena vākyaśeṣāt dṛṣṭāntabalena tadavagataśaighryānavagame tataḥ pravṛttiviśeṣakarastutiviśeṣālābhaprasaṃgāt
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1442: tathāca pracchannatayā gṛhaṃ praviśya pracchannatayaiva nirgate caitre tasya pracchannatayā gṛhapraveśamātraṃ jānānamanyaṃ prati yathā devadatto gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1443: tathaivāyaṃ nirgata iti vākyena devadattaniṣṭhayoreva praveśanirgamanayoḥ pracchannakṛtatvarūpagamyasādhāraṇadharmeṇopamānopameyabhāva ucyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1444: na tu devadattasyeva devadatteneti mukhya evopamānopameyabhāvaḥ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1447: yāgaparatve tu vākyaśeṣasthasyāyamityasya vyavahitayajñamātrakaraṇaparāmarśitvenānārjavaprasaṃgāt pakṣiyāgayoścāmukhya upamānopameyabhāvaḥ syāt;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1451: tadevāśaṅkitopasthitikatvaguṇayogena tathopacaritaṃ mukhyaṃ nipatyādānamiti tatprayojyaṃ pakṣiyāgayoramukhyameva sādṛśyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1454: evamāñjasye vidyamāne 'pi upakrame lāghavānusāreṇa yāgamātravidhinirvāhāya śyenaśabdasya
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1461: sādhanatvena viniyuktavyaktyantaramādāyāyaṃśabdena parāmarśe śyenatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedasya pratīyamānasya bādhāpatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1462: yadyatra “yathā śyeno nipatyādatte evaṃ dviṣanta” mityetāvadeva syāttadekaśyenaniṣṭhakriyayoḥ saṃbhavedapi saḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1464: ata eva dṛṣṭānte 'pi ayaṃpadasattve tanniṣṭhakriyayorupamānopameyabhāvo durupapāda eva /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1468: evañca pravṛttinimittasamarpakatayā vatyarthakavākyaśeṣasya svādhyāyavidhyavagataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ labhyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1469: tava tu anyathāpi stutau vatyarthenaiva prarocitamabhyudayakārītyevaṃ niyamādṛṣṭakalpanāpattiriti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1470: etacca yathaivaṃśabdābhyāṃ samabhivyāhṛtayoḥ śyonasarvanāmnorna bhinnārthatvena pratīyamānayorekārthatvakalpanetyādinā bhinnārthatvakathanena kaustubhepūjyapādaiḥ sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1477: dravye tu svataḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt na tatstutiratyantamapekṣyata iti tatstutyā tatsādhyayāgastutikalpaneti viprakarṣo viśeṣa iti yāgastutyartha ityanena sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1479: evaṃ sandaṃśādipadānāmapi “yathā ha durādānaṃ sandaṃśenādadītaivametenādatta” ityarthavāde taptāyaḥ piṇḍagrahaṇasādhanalohamayasandaṃśenopamānadaśarnānnāmadheyatvaṃ jñeyam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1481: apivā nāmadheyamityatra kva guṇavidhitvaṃ kva nāmadheyatvamiti koṣṭhaśodhanikārthamārambha iti pratijñātaṃ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1485: tadāpattyabhāve 'pi phale yāge vā guṇavidhipūrvapakṣasya yaugikatvenaiva nirāsena nāmatāprasādhanenāyuktatvāt,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1504: tathāpi tadanuvādena teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sahastradakṣiṇāyāśca vidhāne vākyabhedāpatteścitrāpadavadeva na guṇaparatvam,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1507: etadabhiprāyeṇāsminnadhikaraṇe te 'pi cavākyāntareṣu yadā tṛtīyānirdeśaṃ pratipadyante,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1508: tadā vicāryanta iti vārtike tadvyapadeśādhikaraṇavicāryatvaṃ jyotirādipadānāmāpātataḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1514: aṣṭame tviha siddhameva nāmadheyatvam apūrvatādivicārārthaṃ prasaṅgāduktamiti na paunaruktyamiti /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1521: pūrvamubhayatra viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe yāni dūṣaṇāni matvarthalakṣaṇādīni dattāni tānīha ākṣipyante /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1527: ataśca tasmin sarvakārakāṇāṃ bhāvanāvadeva vinaiva matvarthalakṣaṇāṃ vinaiva ca vairūpyaṃ saṃbandhopapattiḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1528: yāgasya ca kriyātve 'pi saṃbandhasāmānyena bhāvanānvayo na virudhyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1531: vājapeyodāharaṇaṃ tu mūle guṇasūtrānurodheneti prāpte --- pacatītyasya pākaṃ karoti pākena karotīti vivaraṇāddhātvarthasya karmatvakaraṇatvānyatarakārakatvenaiva bhāvanānvayaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1535: anyathā śrutyaiva phalaguṇayoryāgānvaye phalānvayārthaṃ yāgasyopādeyatvavidheyatvaguṇatvāni guṇānvaye coddeśyatvānuvādatvaprādhānyānīti viruddhatrikadvayāpatteḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1544: (tantrasaṃbandhenākṣepo yatra yatra pūrvanyāyaviṣayeṣu bhavati tasya sarvasyodāharaṇatvopapādanam)
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1546: phaloddeśena tadvidhau guṇapadānarthakyamiti doṣadvayaṃ tadvyapadeśanyāyaśceti saṃgṛhyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1550: nahi yaugikatvanyāyena sāmānādhikaraṇyena coktaṃ nāmatvaṃ tantrasaṃbandhena nirākartuṃ śakyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1552: guṇadvayasya yāgadvaye tantratvopapattāvapi vidhyanvayatantratve pramāṇābhāvena tadasaṃbhavāt,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1554: ato yatra yatra viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣastatrāpādyamānamatvarthalakṣaṇākṣepo yatra yāgānuvādena guṇavidhipūrvapakṣastatra phalapadānarthakyādidoṣākṣepaśceha kriyete /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1556: aprasakternaitadākṣepa iti sūcayituṃ saṃbhavābhiprāyeṇa yatra yatreti vīpsopādānaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1557: ata eva tatprakhyānyaśāstrodāharaṇaṃ samidādivākyaṃ viśiṣṭavidhipakṣe matvarthalakṣaṇāprasakteḥ tadākṣepārthaṃ bhavatyevodāharaṇam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1559: evaṃ śyenavākye viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe tantrasaṃbandhena matvarthalakṣaṇānirāse sati
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1561: rūḍhyanurodhena somādivākya iva svīkāre bādhakābhāvāt pūrvādhikaraṇasyāpi ākṣepāttaduttaramapyārambho na virudhyate //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1562: etena --- matvarthalakṣaṇākṣepe udbhidadhikaraṇānantarameva asyārambhāpatteḥ asāṅgatyopapādanaṃ nyāyasudhākṛto --- nirastam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1563: yattu --- kaustubhe pūjyapādaiḥ tadvyapadeśanyāyastu naivoddhartuṃ śakyata ityuktam,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1565: ata eva nyāyasudhāyāṃ viśiṣṭavidhimaṅgīkṛtyaiva tadvyapadeśanyāyākṣepo darśitaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1570: ata eva ākṣepasya sādhāraṇye 'pi tatprakhyanyāyaviṣaye 'pi matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaktidyotanāya vājapeyavākyopanyāsa ākare --- ityuktam,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1571: tat peyaviśeṣaṇasya karmadhārayapakṣe pūrvanipātāpatteḥ svaravisaṃvādāpatteśca prauḍhivādamātram //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1577: tadapi na; tathātve udbhinnyāyāviṣayatvāyāgnihotrapade iva bahuvrīherāśrayaṇe matvarthalakṣaṇāyā aprasaktau tantrasaṃbandhena taduddhārārthaitadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvasyāpyanāpatteḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1579: ato yaugikatvavākyabhedatatprakhyanyāyānvinā yāni dūṣaṇāni matvarthalakṣaṇādīni tāni iha ākṣipya samādhīyanta iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1580: (dhātvarthasya bhāvanāyāṃ saṃbandhasāmānyena tatra ca guṇādīnāṃ karaṇatvādinā cānvayanirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ viśiṣṭavidhyasaṃbhavarūpapūrvapakṣopapādanam)
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1589: tathāpi tasya yatnarūpasya kārakājanyatvāt na tatra kārakāṇāṃ anvayaḥ saṃbhavati;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1592: ata e kārakānvayitvāt na tasya kārakatvam,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1593: apitu kriyārūpatvameveti yathaiva siddhānte sakalakārakānvitabhāvanā kriyārūpaiva satī pratyayenocyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1594: tathaiva dhātunā mamāpi kriyārūpa evārtha ucyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1598: ata eva etadanuśāsanabalādeva nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā saṃbandhasya padārthavidhayā bhānam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1599: naca kārakātiriktasya naiva bhāvanāyāmanvaya iti niyamo 'sti;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1602: tathāpi dhātvarthasya saṃbandhasāmānyenaiva tasyāmanvayādekasmin yāge guṇanirūpite
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1603: karmatve phalanirūpite ca karaṇatve aṅgīkriyamāṇe 'pi śābdabodhe tena tena rūpeṇa
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1604: pratītyabhāvāt na vairūpyāpattiriti karaṇatvenānavagamāt na tadanvayārthaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇādyāpattirityabhipretyāha --- yāgasyeti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1605: bhāvārthādhikaraṇaṃ asiddhaṃ matvaitadvicārapravṛttiriti pakṣāntareṇāha --- bhāvanā veti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1611: yena vājapeyasubantenopāttaṃ dravyaṃ guṇatvena vidhīyata iti pūrvapakṣāśayena matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaktirna saṃbhavatītyucyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1612: kintu vājaṃ annaṃ peyam yasminniti surādravyavat yat karma tadevānyapadārthatvena vivakṣitamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1622: taddhi vājapeya eva saṃbhavati nānyatreti tadanurodhena vājapeyodāharaṇaṃ na tu nyāyasudhākṛtprakāśakāroktarītyetyarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1623: (dhātvarthasya saṃbandhasāmānyena bhāvanānvayanirāsena karmatvakaraṇatvādinānvayanirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ somena yajetetyādau sarvatra matvarthalakṣaṇā
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1626: ato yāgakaraṇakabhāvanāyā eva sādhanākāṅkṣitatvena tattadrūpeṇaivānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1627: yadā pūrvoktavivaraṇānurodhādbhāvanāyāḥ dhātvarthātirekeṇa dhātvarthasya ca karaṇatvakarmatvānyatarakārakatvapratītistadā sutarāṃ tenaiva rūpeṇānvayaḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1629: tadabhāve puruṣārthatvāvagatau vā karmatvenaiveti na saṃbandhasāmānyenānvaya iti
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1630: karaṇatvena bhāvanānvaye pārṣṭhikānvayavelāyāṃ yogyatvāt phalenaivānvayaḥ syānnatu
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1631: guṇena vidhisamabhivyāhāre satyapi kathañcit karmatvābhyupagame guṇenaivānvayaḥ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:1634: śrūyamāṇasyaiva kramikabodhadvayajanakatvasvīkāre āvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabheda ityabhipretyāha--- ataśceti //

GSP28jsbh1-4u:3093: vaiṣamyādajahatsvārthaṃ gauṇīṃ darśayituṃ sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭimantraparamiti sṛṣṭipadaṃ prayuktam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3101: gauṇīvṛttinimittāntaraparatayā adhikaraṇabhedaṃ tuśabdena sūcayan viṣayavākyaṃ darśayati --------- prāṇabhṛta iti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3104: “ayaṃ puro bhuvastasya prāṇo bhauvāyano” “vasantaḥ prāṇāyanaḥ” “prāṇaṃ gṛhṇāmi prajābhya”
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3106: mantrāṇāṃ daśadikkrameṇopadhāne “ayaṃ puro bhuva iti purastādupadadhāti prāṇamevaitābhirdādhāre”
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3109: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ prastārayormadhye dvitīye “prāṇaṃ me pāhī“ti prāṇapadaghaṭitastāvadekamantraḥ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3110: tena saha prāṇabhṛtāṃ caturṇāmanyeṣāṃ āmnātānāṃ viniyogā “ccaturṣveva prāṇān dadhātī“tyarthavāde
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3113: tṛtīye “prāṇaṃ me pāhi” iti prāṇapadaghaṭitaikena mantreṇa saha navānāmanyeṣāmaprāṇabhṛnmantrāṇāmāmnātānāṃ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3117: ataeva --------- yadyapi prāṇabhṛcchabdasya mantreṣvabhāvānna sṛṣṭiśabdavat “tadvānāsāmi“ti sūtravihitamatuplopena matubantatayā prāṇabhṛcchabdaprayogasaṃbhavaḥ;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3118: tathāpi prāṇaṃ prāṇaśabdaṃ bibhratīti yogena mantreṣu tadupadheyeṣṭakāsu ca mantradvārā prāṇaśabdabharaṇāttacchabdapravṛttirdraṣṭavyā /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3123: etacca liṅgasamudāyapadasya gauṇārthāpekṣayā vācyālpatvaparatvamaṅgīkṛtamapi yatra dvayorapi sāmyaṃ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3125: tatra gauṇārthopalakṣaṇālpatvābhāvena liṅgasamavāyopapādanāya sāmyasyāpi bhūmavyāvṛttasyopalakṣaṇatayā vyākhyeyam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3128: ata eva pūrvatra bhūmna iva nimittatvaṃ nahyatrālpatvaṃ sūtrakāroktaṃ navātadbuddhiviṣayam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3135: sṛṣṭivākye uktasya matabhedasya samudāyināmajahatsvārthagauṇārthopapādanasya ca saṃcāra ihāpi jñātavya ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3137: naca --------- sṛṣṭiprāṇabhṛdvākyeṣu chatriṇo yāntīti laukikavākye iva svaghaṭitasamudāyāśrayatvasaṃbandhena lakṣaṇāyā evopapatteḥ kimiti gauṇī?
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3138: iti --------- vācyam; abhidheyasaṃbandhitvānādareṇa guṇayogasādṛśyanimittaṃ tattadguṇaprakārakatāpratītyarthaṃ tadāvaśyakatvasya prāgeva darśitatvāt
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3162: yadyapyarthavādādhikaraṇe pūrvapakṣiṇopanyastārthavādaṃ vinā vidhiparyavasānasya nirastatvānnātra vidhiparyavasānena pūrvapakṣa udeti,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3171: vidhereva prarocanākṣepakatvena sāmānyenaiva viśeṣākṣepopapatterarthavādānapekṣaṇena paryavasānopapattyā nirṇītatvamityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3179: jātārthatvāt prāptārthānuvāditvaṃ ceti daurbalye hetutrayaṃ darśitam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3180: “paśumālabhete“ti vidheḥ paśusāmānyavidhāyakasya “chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nubrūhi” iti mantravarṇānurodhena saṃkoce 'pi nātra tasyodāharaṇatvam
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3181: tatra vākyaikavākyatayā vidhimantrayorekaviṣayatvasyaṣaṣṭhāntye pratipādanena paunaruktyāpatteriti sūcanāyārthavādenetyuktam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3182: tathācātra padaikavākyatāpannārthavādavaśeneṣyamāṇasya vidhisaṃkocasya abhyupagamo na yukta ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3184: nanu kāṃsyabhojinyāyena aṅgabhūtārthavādānurodhitvameva vidherastvityāśaṅkāparihārāya saṅkocapadaṃ prayuktam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3185: yatra guṇavidhinā pradhānasya na kiñcit bādhyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3189: etena --------- agnividyāsādhyasyāgnihotrādestadanurodhena traivarṇikaviṣayatayā saṅkocavadihāpi vidhānasyārthavādasādhyatvāttadanurodhena viṣayasaṅkoco 'pi --------- parāstaḥ;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3190: yenāṅgena vinā pradhānaṃ na sidhyati svayaṃ ca yatrākṣipyate tadanurodhena pradhānasyāpi
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3193: ataśca yathā “indrāya tvā vasumate gṛhṇāmī“tyaindramantrasādhyasyāpi somagrahaṇasya
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3196: tadvadaṅgabhūtārthavādānurodhena pradhānabhūtavidheḥ saṅkoco na yukta ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3199: yadyapi pūrvapakṣe sāmānyarūpatayā niścayāt siddhānte caikavākyatayā dhṛtarūpatvaniścayātsandehāsaṃbhave
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3202: bhavantī sā pratītiḥ yathā vākyaśeṣāvadhāritayā vyavasthayā siddhāntinā vāryate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3209: sāmānyāṃśe vidheḥ stāvakatvakalpane 'pi ghṛtāṃśe tadakalpanayā stāvakameva //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3212: tadañjanasādhanadravyāṇāmeka- samudāyasya sattve pramāṇābhāvenānyatamasya sādhanatvānupapatteśca ghṛtacihnasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavādupekṣaṇīyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3214: evañca sāmānyasya viśeṣavyabhicāritvena tallakṣakatvānupapatterviśeṣeṇa sāmānyāvyabhicāriṇā sāmānyalakṣaṇopapatteryena kenacidañjanamiti siddham
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3215: (ākṣepataḥ pūrvamevārthavādena ghṛtasyāñjanasādhanatvenānvayāt na yena kenacidañjanamiti siddhāntopakramaḥ)
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3222: evañca vidheḥ prarocanāśaktirapi na kalpitā bhavati;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3223: ghṛtaprarocanayā samāpte vākye kālpanikyā tailādiprarocanayā vākyāntarārthatāpattyā vākyabhedāpattiśca naprasajyate ityabhipretya siddhāntamāha --------- vidheraviśeṣeti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3226: ata eva yatra somena yajeteti vidhernairākāṅkṣyaṃ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3228: evañcopakramākāṅkṣayaivārthavādasyānvayopapattau tatra ghṛtapadasya lakṣaṇāṅgīkaraṇaṃ niṣprayojanaṃ niṣpramāṇakaṃ cetyāha--------- upasaṃhārasthasyeti
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3230: yathā “yadṛcā stuvate tadasurā anvavāyanyatsāmnā stuvīta tadasurā nānvavāyanni” tyarthavāde kimasurāgamanahetutvenātra nindyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3231: uta vaśīkartuṃ aśakyānāmasurāṇāmapi vaśīkaraṇahetutayā stutiriti sandigdhe tadanantaraśrutena
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3233: nindyate ityavadhāryate tannindāparatva eva tadekavākyatopapatteriti navame arthaikatvādityadhikaraṇe vakṣyate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3235: uktañca vārtike tatraiva --------- vidhistutyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ samānaviṣayeṣyate /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3239: ataeva ādityaḥ prāyaṇīya yadāgneya ityādau ca aditidevatātvairṇayaḥ ityādi nirūpaṇam)
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3240: atraca sūtre sandigdhapadena yaḥ prasiddhaḥ sandehaḥ yaścāvyavasthitārthapratyayaḥ tadubhayamapi sandehatvena vivakṣitam;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3242: ata evoktam vyavarāhādhikaraṇavārtike --------- “sandigdheṣu ca sarveṣu vākyaśeṣeṇa nirṇayam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3243: vakṣyatyeva na tenātra pṛthakkāryā vicāraṇā” iti /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3246: yathā “ādityaḥ prāyaṇīya” ityatra kimaditiśabdaḥ taddhitaprakṛtiḥ uta āditya iti
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3252: asmā agnayo draviṇaṃ datve” tyādau bahuvacanāntatvena devatāparāgniśabdanirdeśādekavacanabahuvacanāntatvayoḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3253: sandehe “agnaye dhriyasve” tyarthavādenaikavacanāntatvena sa eva prakṛtiravadhāryate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3255: evañca yatra vidhau śabdasvarūpameva prakṛtitaḥ pratyayato vā nāvadhāryate,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3259: adhikāśaṅkānirāsāya tu punastatra tantre vicārakaraṇamapi na viruddham /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3260: ataeva “vāsaḥ paridhatte ityatrāpyavyavasthitārthapratītimādāya sandigdhe vidhau “etadvai sarvadevatyaṃ vāso yatkṣaumami” tyarthavādena viśeṣāvadhāraṇamiha bhāṣyakṛtoktam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3266: ataeva atra viśeṣapravṛttavidheḥ nānuṣṭhāpakatvanirvāhāya viśeṣāpekṣitvena viśeṣāpekṣā,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3274: ekor'tho diśyate pratipādyate yābhyāṃ vidhyarthavādābhyāṃ tāvekadeśau,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3276: tasmādityarthena sūtrakṛtā ekaviṣayatvameva mukhyatvena hetutayopāttamityabhipretya sarvavyāpakatayā pūjyapādairekaviṣayatvasyāvaśyakatvāccetyuktam
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3277: yadyapi “uccaiḥ ṛcā kriyate” ityatrāpi ekaviṣayatvāvaśyakatvenaiva hetunā vedaparatvādetadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvam;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3278: tathāpi tatra ṛgādipadānāṃ niścitārthakatvāt sandigdhatvābhāvena vidhigatatvena cānyathānayanamayuktamityadhikāśaṅkānirāsa upakramaprābalyena darśayiṣyata iti na paunaruktyam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3279: nacaikavākyatāṃ vinā paryavasitasya vidhervākyaśeṣāpekṣitve 'pi paryavasitasya tu
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3280: vidhernaiva saṅkoco yukta ityadhikāśaṅkānirāsāya pravṛttaṃ ṣaṣṭhādyadhikaraṇamapi
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3288: pūrvatrārthavādasyeveha vidhāyakatayā pratipāditaprāmāṇyasya vidheḥ sāmarthyānugṛhītasya sandigdhārthanirṇaye 'pi vidhānāntareṇa prāmāṇyapratipādanādadhyāyasaṅgatiṃ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3293: ca vedasya sāpekṣatayāprāmāṇyāpatteḥ tīkṣṇapuṣkaradhārasya ca struvasya kaṭhinadravyāvadāne
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3301: ca nirapekṣasādhanatvavirodhasya duṣpariharatvāt svadhityādīnāṃ cā jinavāsodhikaraṇanyāyena
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3306: tena yatra darśapūrṇamāsādividherekādaśoktavyāyena sarvāṅgaviśiṣṭakarmaviṣayakatayā niścitatvena sandeho nāsti,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3307: tatra sāmarthyānusāreṇa prayājādiṣu śakyamātraviṣayatayā naiva saṅkocakalpanamiti vyatirekeṇa sūcitam /
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3314: tasya sāmarthyānugṛhītāvadyatipadenaiva dravādikarmakāvadānoddeśyatvopapatteḥ prayojanābhāvamabhipretyādhyāhāraṃ vinaiva vākyārthaṃ darśayati --------- ataśceti //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3332: tathātve svadhiterapi puroḍāśāvadāne sāmarthyasattvena māṃsāvadānavyavasthāyā asiddheḥ,
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3334: ataśca puroḍāśāvadānasya hastenāpi saṃbhavāt kṣīṇārthāpatterna svadhitiprayojakatvaṃ kalpanīyamityapi jñeyam //
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3336: yadyapi cārthādveti sūtre vāśabdopādānabalādaikādhikaraṇyameva pūrvasūtraikavākyatayā bhāti;
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3338: asmiṃśca vākye pradātavye ityapi padaṃ kaustubhe dhṛtaṃ tasyāhavanīyolmukena mahāvedyāstṛtabarhiṣonte dāhādutthito vaiśvānarognirartho draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP28jsbh1-4u:3341: mānādhīnatvena meyasiddherāvaśyakasya pramāṇanirūpaṇasyottaratra nirūpaṇe hetutvasūcanadvārā vakṣyamāṇādhyāyārthān śiṣyoparamanirāsārthaṃ pratijānīte --------- ataḥparamiti //
